00027 /*! \file ParameterException.h This file defines parameter exceptions.
00028 */
00029 
00030 namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions
00031 {
00032 
00033 /*! This exception indicates the parameter does not match the requested value
00034  *      TODO: Add member to say what type is expected
00035  */
00036 class ParameterMismatchException : public CalvinException
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   ParameterMismatchException() : CalvinException() {}
00040   ParameterMismatchException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, std::wstring _TimeStamp, std::string _FileName, u_int16_t _LineNumber, u_int64_t _ErrorCode):
00041     CalvinException(_Source, _Description, _TimeStamp, _FileName,  _LineNumber, _ErrorCode) {}
00042     
00043   const std::wstring ToString();
00044 };
00045 
00046 /*! This exception indicates the parameter type does not match the expected type
00047  *
00048  */
00049 class UnexpectedParameterException : public CalvinException
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     UnexpectedParameterException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, std::wstring _TimeStamp, std::string _FileName, u_int16_t _LineNumber, u_int64_t _ErrorCode, const std::wstring& expectedType_):
00053       CalvinException(_Source, _Description, _TimeStamp, _FileName,  _LineNumber, _ErrorCode),
00054       expectedType(expectedType_){}
00055   const std::wstring ToString();
00056 protected:
00057         /*! String with the name of the expected type */
00058         std::wstring expectedType;
00059 };
00060 
00061 /*! This exception indicates a parameter value is out-of-range */
00062 class OutOfRangeParameterException : public CalvinException
00063 {
00064 public:
00065         /*! Constructor
00066          *      @param lower_ lower limit of the range
00067          *      @param upper_ upper limit of the range
00068          */
00069         OutOfRangeParameterException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, std::wstring _TimeStamp, std::string _FileName, u_int16_t _LineNumber, u_int64_t _ErrorCode, const std::wstring& lower_, const std::wstring& upper_):
00070           CalvinException(_Source, _Description, _TimeStamp, _FileName,  _LineNumber, _ErrorCode), 
00071           lower(lower_), upper(upper_) {}
00072   const std::wstring ToString();
00073 protected:
00074         std::wstring lower;
00075         std::wstring upper;
00076 };
00077 
00078 /*! This exception indicates that the parameter string is too long */
00079 class ParameterStringTooLongException : public CalvinException
00080 {
00081 public:
00082         /*! Constructor
00083          *      @param len Max length of the string
00084          */
00085         ParameterStringTooLongException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, std::wstring _TimeStamp, std::string _FileName, u_int16_t _LineNumber, u_int64_t _ErrorCode, int32_t len):
00086           CalvinException(_Source, _Description, _TimeStamp, _FileName,  _LineNumber, _ErrorCode), maxLen(len) {}
00087           const std::wstring ToString();
00088 protected:
00089         int32_t maxLen;
00090 };
